original_text: But Samson only stayed with the woman until the middle of the night. Then he got up and he went to leave through the city gate. He took hold of its doors and the two posts that held them. He pulled them all down together, with the metal bar that locked them. He carried them all in one piece on his shoulders. He left them at the top of the hill near Hebron.
korean_text: 삼손이 밤중까지 누워 있다가 그 밤중에 일어나 성 문짝들과 두 문설주와 문빗장을 빼어 가지고 그것을 모두 어깨에 메고 헤브론 앞산 꼭대기로 가니라

sentences.original_text: But Samson only stayed with the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 삼손은 그 여인과 함께 잠시 머물렀습니다

sentences.original_text: until the middle of the night
and he went to leave through the city gate
He took hold of its doors
and the two posts that held them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 문들을 지지하는 두 기둥도 붙잡았습니다

sentences.original_text: He pulled them all down together
with the metal bar that locked them
He carried them all in one piece
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 한 덩어리로 모두 들어올렸습니다

sentences.original_text: He left them at the top of the hill
